p: Fruits of Datura metel (Angel’s trumpet) were obtained from the ground of Razagram (Khall, Distt; Dir, KPK, Pakistan. The plant specimen was identified by Dr. Muhammad Ilyas, Head of the Department of Botany, University of Swabi, KPK, Pakistan. The voucher specimen no. Bot (UOS-521) was deposited at the herbarium of the Botany Department, University of Swabi.
